biotools.summary: The server can be used to: (1) predict residues to be at the putative protein interface(s) by considering single protein chain with resolved 3D structure; (2) analyse protein-protein complex with given 3D structural information and identify residues that are being in interchain contact.

bioschemas.name: SPPIDER
bioschemas.summary: The server can be used to: (1) predict residues to be at the putative protein interface(s) by considering single protein chain with resolved 3D structure; (2) analyse protein-protein complex with given 3D structural information and identify residues that are being in interchain contact.
